values:
Heyyy Guys.
I got a little request.
Can you post some pics/self-cam pics of Seungri?
I just LOVE him so much.
thanks thanks... :D

Merry Christmas everyone!

Last night was one of the best nights I've ever had since the Christmas break. Wow. It was like a Gelanco reunion here last night (well except for my other uncle. he's in the province). All of my cousins in mom's side were here and it's just so fun. 

AND.. BIGBIG thanks to all those people who greeted me and my family yesterday and today!

So I've got hangovers from last night and my head still hurts from all those screaming the kids made in the middle of the night. Seriously, I think their mouths should be taped once in a while. gawwwwd. 

Anyways, one of my cousins, Angelene is so ADORABLE. I love her to bits.
So I just woke up and she was screaming her lungs out coz she couldnt find her mommy anywhere so i got up the bed and went to their room. I tried to comfort her and one of my aunts went to the room and opened her wallet and got some bucks. Angelene stopped crying and said, "tita, penge aku pewa(pera)?" in her cutest voice. haha. She's just so cute.

Right now I just wanted to relax, sleep and stop eating. Promise, this is what I hate about Christmas, it always gets me fat. awww. Tomorrow will be another hectic day for me. gawd. haha.

anyways, have a great week ahead!

I'm sorry it took me a long time to update. My keyboard got fucked up so I had to buy a new one and the telephone line was down. waaaa.

Ok so today was a miracle coz i woke up really early. 7am is early, right? Well, in my life it's already an achievement. Waking up early in a weekend or a weekday(w/o school of course) morning is very rare for a girl like me. So I woke up, walked a little bit in the playground, went inside the house, checked my phone (to see if there were any messages, unfortunately, none.), walked again around the playground. Okay so basically i was just checking some guy out that's why i was walking around the playground again and again. Any problem with that? haha. Is it my problem that he's cute? it's his. = )

so... Two days w/out classes. This rocks. But I hope the storm wouldn't push through tomorrow here in our place, coz that would surely suck and It's dads bday celebration and I suuuuper miss my cousins. Though his bday's really yesterday and we celebrated it last night in HulaHula at westgate but i would still insist on the celebration tomorrow. whatever happens. grrrr. haha.

Anyways, everybody here in our neighborhood feels the christmas spirit already, even the people here in our house. except me. haha. Well, I just don't wanna get that feeling yet. Because, One, I still have no money for gifts. Two, I have no idea on what gift I should give to my friends and my cousins. And Three, Christmas means it's the end and endings makes me sad.

okaay. so have a lovely day ahead people!

This is the 3rd time that i made a new lj. i just can't seem to be contented with the second one and the 1st one seems so boring.  

Anyways, I'll try to keep this one clean. I'll TRY. 

So much for my introduction.  

Btw, I'd like to congratulate my friend for winning the doubles game in table tennis earlier. Love you yie. You did great. = ) And thanks for dropping me home. I love you more for that.  = ) 

On my way home, in a trike, with charie, I realized a lot of things. That I'm blessed with a lot of good friends. A LOT. And I admit that at some point in my life I thought I made the most foolish decision that I could ever make. Letting a friend drive me away. AND let her think I have "LOW CLASS" friends. Because you know what?! I have the "HIGHEST CLASS OF FRIENDS" a person like me could ever have and I know that we've got eachothers back whenever we need. so, wbu? 

enough off my rantings. as i said, i'll try to keep this one clean. 
ciao! 
te amo.
